person.persName: Benjamin F. Hume (Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Callen Hume in Pendleton County on July 4, 1842. Father of William A. Hume, Samuel F. Hume, Sarah J. Hume, and Nancy C. Hume. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860. 1st Sergeant of the 4th Kentucky Cavalry Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) from September 15, 1862, to October 26, 1862.
